content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my lunch break inside my car (on the passenger seat) when i decided to recline the seat, to be more comfortable.  

then i saw a low flying cross-shaped object.  it was transparent, outlined with a white border.  movement was a little bit faster than planes usually move.  there were no blinking lights or sound.

the white outlining border was strange, it reminded me of the outline of wonder woman's cartoon airplane, as funny as that sounds.  i could simply see sky through the outlined portion.

also, since i go surfing fishing, the shape somewhat reminded me of a shovelnosed guitarfish: https://en.Wikipedia.Org/wiki/file:shovelnose_guitarfish.Jpg

i blinked twice and rubbed my eyes just to make sure that it was real.

whew! what an experience!  it was weird, but i did not get scared.  i waved up, wishing that it is in fact an alien craft :) i thought oh my gosh! the aliens are here!  too bad i did not get a chance to snap pics, even though it was transparent, only given away by the white outline, maybe it would have still been discernible.
content.summary: Object has a visible outline shaped like a cross but body is transparent

content.detailedDescription: Prior to 2000(fall or early winter)saw 3 solid black pyramid shaped objects moving from se to nw from the patio of my house. first 2 were approx. 200 feet equilaterally, spaced equidistance (approx. 200 feet) followed by a huge ship that may have been 400 yards across. all moving equally, silently, slowly <100 mph until out of sight.
content.summary: 3 pyramid shaped objects silently cross nitetime sky 2 large, 1 huge

content.detailedDescription: Was on vacation at the beach in hampton, nh. our condo was approximately 400 yards from the beach. at 7:52, we spotted what appeared to be a flare, rising up from the water. however, after watching it for a few seconds, it became apparent it was not rising up, but rather coming from over the ocean and flying directly over us. after watching for about 30 seconds, i took my iphone out and began filming it. i managed to get 17 seconds recorded. once the object had passed to the west, it dimmed and faded out of sight. after i stopped recording, i could still the the silhouette of the object in the night sky, but it was too faint to capture on the phone camera.
content.summary: Glowing oval/orb flew directly overhead moving east to west

content.detailedDescription: When ý middle of my shift ý looked at top of nearest building then i saw ufo lighting red, green and white. ýt's occurred about a 15 sesc. time is near 23:00 at kuþadsý
content.summary: Ý saw ufo at my night shift

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping in my bed and awoke to a strange sound.  it was very high pitched and seemed like a chirping, purring, or singing of sorts...Some sound i have never heard before.  i own a set of crystal singing bowls and it slightly resembled the sound of two being played together.  i rolled over to look at my window where the sound had been coming from.  i saw a blue/white light, and at first i thought it was a cell phone or a laptop monitor or something.  initially i thought maybe someone was trying to break into my room, but then i realized that sound could not be coming from a human.  the object didn't appear to move, and the sounds/toneswere changing as if it were communicating or singing.  it didn't sound angry or violent, but i was terrified...I remember looking at my cat who was at the end of my bed and realized that my cat was observing this object too.  i don't recall exactly how long it went on for but i can remember at least a few minutes of sitting, staring and listening, just petrified.  i wanted to move the blinds from my window to see what was there but i just couldn't do it.  i don't recall the exact moment that things ended, but i do remember checking my ipad next to my bed and it was 2:57 a.M.  after the event i was terrified and almost wanted to cry because i had no idea what had just happened.  i eventually cuddled up with my cat and fell back asleep...I remember a few times in the night that nugget (the cat) jumped in and out of bed, and at one point i remember seeing him sitting on the windowsill as if he were looking for something...He doesn't commonly sit there, so i thought that was particularly strange....
content.summary: Woke up in the middle of the night to a strange sound i've never heard and saw a blue/white orb hovering outside of my bedroom window.

content.detailedDescription: I kept waking up around two or three am and was unable to move. this continued for a couple of weeks. i was about three months pregnant and when i went to the doctor she said it might be poor circulation. i also had a problem bleeding so she recommended i stay in bed. one night i woke up and just like all the rest of the nights this happened i couldn't move again. this time i saw a three foot tall old man looking being, crossing in front of me slowly from left to right in front of my bed. he even walked like an old man and scooted slowly from foot to foot. i was terrified and my first thought was not alien. he did not look like anything i had seen before. i do not recall the rest of the night. after the experience i stopped bleeding and i am now super interested in physics and science. i feel as if i were woken up. my son whom i was pregnant with is 9 now and he has experiences and so does my daughter. after the experience i have had many more. i have also started to remember past events that are similar in nature.  i get the feeling that what ever i have dealt with is positive in nature although it scares me to death to think of seeing one again.
content.summary: Woke up and couldn't move, was pregnant w/ bed rest, problems went away

content.detailedDescription:
The insdent that happend this morning (aug 9th)  i was siting out the back of my house at 6am having a smoke watching the suneise and looking at the other 2 'ufos' that have been in the sky for over 2 month now (will go into more detail). there had been 2 planes both going s to n at roughly 6am then about half an hour later as the sun had risen more i seen another 'plane' i thought flying e to w but there was no sound or flashing lights as you get with planes, it was going alot slower then the other 'ufos' ive seen over the last 2 months and it seemed to be towing another ufo behind it as the one behind had very dim lights compartd to.The one in frount and was also comping the movments ofthe one in frount, nothing realing exsiting happened with this sigting apart from the fact it was derectly above me and closer than the others ive been seeing. i watched the 'ufo' fligh off untill i couldnt se. it any more.


as for the others over the past 2 months..The first time i seen the first ufo it was flighing along the horizen straight at a plane.I called my partner and a friend who was staying over to see this 'plane crash' as i thought it was.. i first though i was going to see a head on plane crash, just before they would of crashed the light to the right just takes of straight up and at least 3 times the speed of the flashing plane to the right., the plane just kept on its path the same speed abd the other light the 'ufo' flew up high and just sat tgere for an hour or so with no movment at all. the lights it gave off are brighter than any star but roughly the same colour as a star but sometimes had a pulsing orange light before gping back to all white pulseing light..That night the 'ufo' would move slowly around with a blue 'beam' type thing for a few seconds comeing down..Over the next month it was there every night (a few nights i coudnt see it as there was heavy clouds and storms) but it was always there after the clouds had gorn...Over the next few weeks another 'ufo' was in the sky...The two seemed to 'shoot' red beams at each other and also have heaps of tiny light leave the big ones at time to time....Up untill now (aug 9) ive been trying to come up with a logical explnation for what i had been seeing but nothing i know of can fly at them speeds, create coulourd beams, or have lots of smaller lights come off it....But after i seen the one this morning there really isnt anything human that i know.Of that can fligh below clouds and not make a sound at all.
content.summary: Been seeing 'ufos' for roughly a month now, but this morning one flew right over me

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were taking some pictures of a church close to walmart in 
laramie (wyoming) around 18:30 on june 2 2014. a series of shots were taken and when we looked at the photos later we found this weird looking round object which appears in between two shots. i cannot identify what it is, maybe it is just a bird seen from a weird angle. i just thought i'd report it in case this is of any interest.
content.summary: Strange ball on the sky

content.detailedDescription: On august 08, 2014 between 10 and 10:30 am i was walking my company parking lot as i do about 5 times a day. i work in an industrial area on the northwest side of houston, texas. i started looking up while i walk about late june, early july this year just to see if i would see any ufo's. i have had 6 or 7 personal sightings since i have started looking up during my daily walks. this is the first time i was able to catch anything on video. i am walking around with a canon pc1586 12.1 mega pixel camera. i see these "black dot" ufo's almost every day. this is the first time the camera i use has caught what i saw on video. it was only visible for a few seconds, but i caught it! it is very small and in the upper, left side of the frame flying under the white cloud. i am not saying it is et, but i do believe it is a real unidentified flying object. i have shot video of planes and birds for comparison and i know that this was no plane or bird, as it made no sound, and would have been easily identified if it was a plane or bird. i am only giving you the video of the ufo because my video of planes and birds was shot separately from the ufo and i don't want to confuse any viewers or waste your site's memory space on an obvious object that can be identified. i see these types of ufo's on many other videos, so i do not think anyone out there knows what they are or who made them. who ever does won't tell us what it is anyway or people would not be sharing them as ufo sightings because they would be identified at that point. sorry if i talk too much. this is my first documented sighting, and my first public posting regarding ufo's. i am skeptical, but i have always believed we are not alone, and that we have been visited by life from other planets. for what it is worth, there ya go!
content.summary: See these a lot during the day in houston. small, black dots that are not airplanes, helicopters, birds, or bugs. first time the camera i have caught it on video.

content.detailedDescription:
On january 5, 2003 at around 11:00 p.M. i was in my bedroom at home preparing for bed. i looked out my window as i usually do every night and i looked up and saw some lights travelling all together in a y shaped formation. i first thought these may be satellites or fighter jets. i only saw a white/star like light. they were travelling very high on a clear night. 5 lights made up the y shaped pattern (i have attached a computer drawing of what i saw). the lights were moving all at the same speed and travelling from the southeast to the northwest. after the first 5 lights in a y shaped formation crossed my house, i saw another one, same formation, same speed. then another one and another one. at this point i knew these were no satellites or planes. every so often the set of lights in the y pattern would be moving slower than the previous one, then another would come by and travel faster. each set held the same flight path. i saw 16 sets of this y shaped pattern all with 5 lights to the set. all the lights were a different brightness. the first two lights were bright, the third light was really bright and the 2 lights that made the distinctive y shaped were a soft glow. by around 11:50 p.M. the 16th set was moving the slowest and then came to a stop above my house at around midnight. i watched the object for an additional 45 minutes to an hour and the lights remained stationary. at this point i had to get up pretty early so i closed my blinds and went to bed.

i grabbed my film camera during the event to try and see if i could photograph it. the object in the sky was so large that i could not get the entire y shaped formation in my shot, however i was able to take photos of the brightest light. i began taking as many pictures as i can, considering this was film based i could not see the photo until after it was developed so i took as many as possible. once i got them back only 2 came back, which i have attached

i have put a grey outline box around the brightest light. you'll notice in both of the photographs there seems to be 2 additional lights in front of the brightest light in the formation, and possibly another one above it. i did not see these additional lights. these photos were taken with the flash on and through my window. i tried to get my window sill in these photos so that the photo could be exposed with more light. you may also notice some streaking from the light(s) the object did not admit a streak this is just the exposure time on the camera. please note that i still have the original photographs.

i knew the event that i saw wasn't any satellites or fighter jets or planes. i can see jets flying in formation like that but 16 sets of these over a residential neighbourhood in the 11 pm hour, highly doubt it. it was more curiosity and wondering what this event actual was, it was very strange and nothing that i've heard or seen before. i've heard of pearl necklace ufo's so i guess this was similar in style.

i do not know what i saw or if it can be explained, it was down right strange.
content.summary: A 'y' shaped formation of lights - 16 sets flew above my house

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to let my dogs out looked up in the sky as i always do looking at the stars. all the sudden i looked to my left and saw this very bright looking star. it stayed there for a bit then started moving to the east as i watched it move it picked up speed then just vanished. there was no noise so not sure what i saw but would love to see it again. i wanted to go grab my camera but i just couldn't take my eyes off this very bright object. i even went back outside after to see if maybe it came back but no luck.
content.summary: Bright light figured it was a star but moved very fast then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: The object was not seen until the pictures were observed, it was only visible in one picture which were taken within a couple of seconds.
content.summary: Like a mist above the event campsite next to raf st mawgan.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were on the back porch facing ne 3 1/2 blocks from the atlantic ocean in north myrtle.  out of my peripheral i noticed the orange flickering object traveling up and down in a se direction.  it seemed to waver or float like a leaf floating, but traveling south for sure over the atlantic ocean.  i grabbed my wife's i phone 5 to video.  i only got three seconds of video before the phone seemed to get stuck.  it shut off and i was able to later to power the phone up and see that it did capture 3 seconds of video. 

after the video clip ends, it wavered up and down still traveling in a south to south east direction.  we were able to follow it for nearly 30 seconds.  the orange flickering object seemed to flicker at a slower rate and finally twinkled out into darkness.  we were still in the field of view to follow the object, but it flickered out.

the object seemed to look like something struggling to stay in flight, it appeared to be burning or flickering. 

we often see strange lights and object over the ocean.  this was different from what we have seen in the past.
content.summary: 930 pm north myrtle beach orange flickering object appeared from ne traveling in no pattern in sw direction.  lasted nearly 30 seconds.  after phone recorded 3 seconds, it shut off

content.detailedDescription:
Two of us were on a walk around the local area and my friend decided to take a scenic photo. when he posted it on a computer later we both saw the image and realised something in it shouldn't be there. we were at the top of a local quarry and the object must have been flying down the derwent valley near to starkholmes.

it must have been moving fast and without noise because it's very quiet up there and we'd have seen it and heard it. i didn't notice any large birds in the area - and to be honest, it would have had to have been a massive bird to show up like that at that sort of distance.

five minutes after he took that photo the red arrows display team came over us heading in the same direction. whenever a plane or helicopter or microlight flies down that valley you can hear it really loudly, so it can't have been a plane. 

weirdly, we started talking about ufo's shortly afterwards, for a part of the three hour walk - even though we aren't into them at all. we even saw a van with "first contact" painted on the side of it and wondered if there was some sort of convention or government thing going on. but we didn't know about the photo then.

if you zoom in on the photo you can see some sort of weird thing like heat-haze off a road in summer all around it.

maybe none of this helps. but it is what it is.
content.summary: Noticed ufo at distance on photo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my hunting club in s.C. i had just left my stand and walking across a field toward a wood line it was dark in the woods where i was hunting but as i cross3e the field the sky was light. i noticed the object very high in the sky. it was not moving i got to the wood line and looked at the object with my scope a 9 power. and observed smaller objects flying around under it. after observation i returned to my truck. and went to my cabin. and turned on the tv and tuned to the science channel. and low and behold the same object was shown in a program that had been televised some time earlier the tv representation was exactly as the one i observed. according to the commentator the object was very large about 3 to 5 football fields. i was amazed. this is my only encounter. when i tell friends they think iam whacko. my wife does not believe me either. people just ignore the story. 
this has bothered me for some time. and i saw mufon on a local channel at home and decided to give my info. if you have any info concerning my description please reply.
content.summary: Shaped like a blimp but slinder with three objects flying under it

content.detailedDescription:
It was 5:30pm in north las vegas, nv. my husband and child were swimming in the backyard pool when my husband called me to come outside because he thought he could see a ufo. i went outside and viewed a silver round object that also had a little white from the reflection of the sun. it was really high and looked almost starlike, but bigger than a star and we knew there was no way it was a star because it was daytime. it hovered for around 5 minutes and then slowly headed west. i got my telescope hoping to get a closer look, but unfortunately with the movement we could not focus on it. my cell phone camera would also not focus on it due to the height and distance.

after it headed west it stopped and hovered again for another 3-5 minutes. i just kept staring at the object when all of a sudden it just vanished. right before my eyes it just completely disappeared. it was the most bizarre thing i have ever seen.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovered and then slowly headed west. hovered again and then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming the sky due to a heavy chemtrail assault happening out west over the mountains, when i was checking my footage later in the day i saw what appears to be craft of moderate size zooming in and out of the clouds... a flat mushroom shapped craft with a dark grey metalic look with highly reflective surfaces.
i was, as far as i know, the only witness to this event.
content.summary: Filming chemtrail spraying and when i checked footage i found the craft

content.detailedDescription: A family ember described it as they were looking out their bedroom window just after midnight because they heard something. looked up and saw an oval shaped craft with 6 to 8 lights around the edges. it hovered for a couple of minutes then rocked backwards kind of then then went forward and straight up very fast until it disappeared.
content.summary: Oval shape,6 to 8 lights around edge,hovered then went backwards a bit then shot straight up,disapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on the beach at night where one sees many flights going into new york city, i suddenly noticed some lights that were moving in a arc path - first up then down.  there was a white flickering light (at the rate of about 3 flickers per second) and a red light.  as it came to a low point in the arc, close to the ocean, it stopped and the white light went off.  then the red light slowly lowered itself towards the ocean surface.  i could see the horizon in the dark and the light was lower than the horizon.  i was about 8 feet above sea level and stand 6 feet tall, so the light was much lower than 14 feet about the surface.  the red light went on and off a few times and finally disappeared.  i waited there for about 2 minutes but it did not reappear.
content.summary: Red & white lights flying in arc parth, then lands on ocean surface.

content.detailedDescription:
On feb 18th 2012, i went to sleep as usual in my bedroom with my family.
and woke up the next day having had a bizaare and very vivid dream.

this is what i remember from the dream:
i had the sense that i lived alone.
i kept getting disturbed by unseen intruders in my apartment for several nights.
in the kitchen of this apartment, i was finishing-off doing the dishes in the kitchen. i was aware of a presence watching me and was trying to ignore it. i wanted to finish doing the dishes so that i could go to sleep.
in reality, i don't live in that apartment.

then within my dream, i was sleeping, felt wierd sensations, found myself paralyzed and then suddenly, i saw the face of one of those grey, bug-eyed aliens.
the being was silent and felt 'cold' and it stared straight at me from about 1-3 feet away from my face for several seconds.Seeing this, i felt a fear emerge in me and i thought "whow, i'm actually scared of these things."
(this strange double-perception within my being..Of being scared and simultaneously also of being amused that i was scared would be clarified in a major awakening around the end of april.)
then i percieved that i was woken-up from my sleep in a bed and a room that was not the one i actually live in. the walls were white, the bedsheet i was laying-on was white but my body was not covered with any bedsheets. i was wearing shorts like i usually do.
there was a blue light filling the room. i don't know if it was just a symbolic representation of 'night' as shown in movies. (they use a blue camera filter to record night scenes in the daytime i believe.)
then i was looking at my body struggling against paralysis, shaking left and right like a fish trying to get-up from the bed and not being able to. my eyes appeared to be open but i could not scream or get-up.
i was clearly moving away from my struggling body with the feeling of a slight 'concern' for the body. i was aware that i'm being led away from my body.
then i perceived that i had been abducted somehow and i woke up lying down in what looked like a soft black enclosure that felt like a coffin. there was a black cloth i was covered-in. i seemed to be lying down on what felt like a 'shelf.'
i noticed that there was just a tiny streak of light visible in 'a crack' in the cloth and i heard a not-so-subtle rumble of an engine that i had never heard before which i knew to be a spaceship i was being transported in.
i moved the cloth away from my face (but i don't recall if i used my hands) and looked to realize that i was being transported in a classic flying saucer craft. it was circular on the inside and smoothly lit by a not-so-bright white light everywhere though i saw no bulbs anywhere. the craft appeared to be joint-less and made out of a single mold. i thought i saw the faint outline of a door to my diagonal right where it was darker. it was also darker where i was on the 'shelf.' the color of the whole structure inside was predominantly gray-brown but also a subtler purplish-greenish with a smooth but textured finish. to my left was the wall of the shelf i was laying on so i couldn't see the other third of the craft's interior. and straight beyond it, i saw the same type of gray being looking straight (and away from me) with one hand horizontal and probably placed on something out of my view. i realized the creature was the pilot and was flying the craft.
i thought to myself.. i better pretend to be asleep. i also thought "hah! dreams can continue from one night to another."
then, there was no sign of aliens or spaceships but i was woken-up somehow. i had the sense that i had just landed and was walking away from the craft which, i had the sense, was behind me. i didn't look backwards and i found myself walking into a nice, sunny place with (i think) had green grass benath me and i met a bunch of 'cool humans' who were moving quickly and excitedly toward me to receive my arrival. in particular, there was a guy in his 30s who came right-up to me, had his arms high-up ready to hug me (i don't recall the actual hug.) in the dream, it seemed that i knew these people and they knew me well. but in reality i have no idea who they were and i had no idea where i had landed. then a few mins later, the scene changed, and the guy who hugged me was sitting next to me and showing/teaching me something very technical on a circular (i think) panel laid-out like a table in front of us that i recall looked very complicated. it was some kind of equipment/desk. we both looked human and i looked just as i did in 2012 with regard to hair, skin and clothing. i dare to say that the panel was the interior of another spaceship. i'm not sure what the equipment was but i remember struggling to absorb what technical stuff this friend was eagerly teaching me.
he seemed like a buddy i knew. i have no recall of any detail regarding what he was showing me, what i was learning or what was spoken by either he or i. i don't recall speaking either but just looking down pleasantly at the panel as his hands pointed to different things on it and teaching me about how it worked apparently.

i don't recall getting back on a spaceship/travelling or getting back to my body or any such thing. 

when i woke up the next morning, the near-shock of the vividness of that dream became apparent. and the face of that gray alien was etched in my memory. all i had to do was close my eyes and it's face was crystal clear. this disturbed me greatly. it took me about 6-7 months to get it out of my head.

there were no 'dreams' of this type i had prior to this one nor since then.

then around april 2012, i had a powerful and corrective spiritual awakening in which i saw my own soul and realized that i was not a human either. i was an invisible awareness that was connected to the mind of a human being. i was not the human being itself. i realized that almost all of humanity has forgotten what they are and the freedom i felt was absolutely priceless and unmatched by any other human experience i had ever had. a tremendous clarity overcame me and the scriptures of all the saints, gurus and "enlightened" masters suddenly made sense. i never before understood their message because i was missing this one experience. i understood that this experience is what is called enlightenment and self-realization. there was no separation between science and spirituality anymore and the crux of the source of all major religions became clear to me. i remembered that i had always been separate from the human and connected to the human mind. but somehow, i had forgotten this for decades and believed that i was a human. this turned out to be 100% false.
there became no fear of living nor dying anymore and there was a clear understanding that an alien being too is an awareness connected to the shape of a humanoid body.
i am of the opinion that the alien visitation had something to do my "waking up from the zombie sleep."  i certainly was never harmed during the abduction. 
but my memory is fragmented of the abduction experience.
content.summary: I woke-up paralyzed, ejected from my body, put on craft & taken somewhere.

content.detailedDescription:
Everyday when i was 17 in 2007 after midnight i watched stars direction ne above the trees which were 50 meters from home, 10 degrees right and 15 up from sirius. i was thinking myself, what a beautiful star, but after a minute i realized it shoudn't be there. i grab my telescope, which at that time was only plastic toy when i was young and tried to focus on it. i saw only it look like a star, but after trying to guess, why it is there, it started after 10 minutes from the start of the observation, moving from ne to the east slowly. it was white, blurry and pretty big. it was not burning, so it was no falling star - which i personally love to watch and cross fingers - neither it was some falling and burning satellite etc. after one length between algenib - scheat from pegasus constellation, it was split in 3 same pieces, going still slowly to the east and they didnt stopped at all for the time of splitting ... the whole event took about 10-15 minutes, in which there was a descent, minimal but it was.

since then i am afraid of going alone to the forest which i really love the nature and dark, and i feel being observed there. it means i feel not alone. sometimes i cry inside, why i am not there but on earth.

many times i go to the forest, even when i feel its scary for me and something is pulling me inside the forest, just like the forest is some kind of aphrodisiac and i dont mean the dark of it. it mesmerizes me whole time.

when i look at the sky i see alot of moving white light without blinking. i was thinking they are satellites, moving on the night sky, but wait, i shouldn't see them with bared, naked eyes.

most probably it were 2 objects attached to one bigger somehow or one big made of 3 pieces, probably triangles. it was beautiful, so natural and flawless. i waited so many ears to be sure.
content.summary: Brighter than sirius in wrong place like star, then after 10 minutes path east and split in 3 smaller objects moving near each other.

content.detailedDescription: I had just left saskatoon at 1:17am, i know because i text my husband to let him know, and continued my drive to alberta. at 1:23am the sky lit up like i've never seen it do before, the entire sky turned white so i looked out over the wheel up to the sky to see if i could see anything..... well i did, and it have never been more terrified, there was what appeared to me to be an extremely bright white missile shooting towards the ground, i thought that i was done, i woke up my passenger and he was able to witness it just before it hit the fog in the farmers field next to us (the fog only being about 10feet in height) this object was about the same size as a school bus.  by this time i had pulled over as well and saw that as it went into the fog, still full speed, it turned bright green and disappeared . once i realized that there was no blast, no, boom, no explosion, i immediately text my husband again asking him to please call me, he didn't right away so i tried him, and was told by my phone that  my service was temporarily unavailable. in my panic i text him again with a plain now, to which he replied that he couldn't call me, as when he tried he was told i was unavailable.  it was about 2 hours later that i could finally make calls again. well i started driving again and had my passenger text my husband for me, to which we were informed that my husband saw this light 6hrs away. i started to feel numb within 15 mins of the sighting, to the point where i had to pull over and let my friend take over for awhile, within 25minutes i was feeling extremely nauseous, and within 40mins we had to pull over so i could vomit. after that i felt better so i contributed it to my nerves, so i got back behind the wheel and continued on my way home. i instantly noticed that something was not right  in my left side peripheral vision, and still cannot tell you what was there because everything in me told me to not look in that direction. about 1hr 30mins after the sighting i couldn't do it anymore, i was struggling to no look left  in which there seemed to be a pull for me to do so, but i refused to so i wouldn't . i pulled over in a roadside turnout ( place to throw out garbage along the highway, or take a quick rest) and was very surprised at how full it was, and i had a hard time finding a spot to park. but as soon as we stopped moving i was hit with an overwhelming tiredness so i  made sure that we were locked in ( false security i know) and fell asleep for about 10min when i was suddenly awake, i still felt a bit woozy and tried to get back to sleep, i noticed it was 3:01am at that time, i layed there for a long time with my eyes closed and rested until i felt ok to hit the road again. well my husband being inquisitive instantly looked at the news, weather network, and online for an explanation, none being found until after i had been home for hours when a friend posted an article from a newspaper saying that the uofcalgary had released a photo to the of  a "fireball" that had happened at the same time of my sighting. i know what i saw wasn't a fireball, so i called the university's astronomy section and was informed that a fireball did not happen, that i must have misread something somewhere. i then called the newspaper and spoke to the author of the article, he had said that he originally contacted the uofc after many reports of this blinding bright white light in the sky coming in,he was then sent a picture of a photo that they had take of said object. i told him that the school denied reporting anything at all to them he let me go to call them back , where it was denied to him as well.
content.summary: Possible abduction...... please help!

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to leave my parents' house to go home and was talking to my mother out in the front yard. at 10:40 p.M. out toward the horizon above the tree line there was a single spherical shape red/orange/yellow in color. the light emanating from the object never had blinking lights, instead it pulsated randomly. the object flew along a path, then seemed to hover and its light steadily and quickly disappeared.  the object then reappeared at 10:45 p.M. and 10:50 p.M. where it seemed to take the exact same path with the exact same characteristics. we waited to see if the object would reappear for a fourth time but it never did, not where we were looking anyway. after my mother and i witnessed the object for the second time i called my brother to have him come out where the 3 of us were able to witness the last event at 10:50 p.M.
content.summary: Red/orange/yellow orb hovering, disappearing, and reappearing three times.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work when i noticed an object hovering above a group of trees. at first i thought maybe its a plane but the n i thought why would a plane be flying this low late at night. as i approvhed the curve i was turning into i stayed hovered. when i exited the curve it was gone. but i do remember as i was goin thru the curve i heard what sounded like, an im not kidding, but it sounded like cows mooing.
content.summary: Driving home from work and noticed a rriangle shape object hovering above trees

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out the window when i saw an object in the sky that appeared to be spinning and changing in color as it did. the object appeared to be in a pyramidal shape and as the object span it changed colors which alternated between blue, red, and white. after the color change occurred each color on the object pulsated for a few seconds and then the object spun and another color change occurred. this same behavior occurred and it appeared as though the object was moving in a straight path with small directional variations sometimes moving slightly to the side left/right. after this event, a helicopter flew over my street for a while where the object was and then it flew away. an airplane also appeared to fly over, but i don't think the events were related. 

the object stood out because it appeared to be spinning and the colors coming form the craft were pulsating. 

i immediately thought the object was either a government craft or one of extraterrestrial origins. 

i just stared at it and i wanted to know what it was because it was unlike any object in the sky that i saw before. the weirdest thing about this was seeing the outline of the craft as the colors pulsated and i realized the object was in a pyramidal shape which ruled out the object being a plane. i was left wondering.
content.summary: Spinning pyramid shaped object with alternating colors on each side of the craft as it span.

content.detailedDescription:
A regular skywatcher, on many clear nights outside my home, i watch for an hour or two (sometimes with binoculars).  i have done this for the past year, so i know the flight patterns of both commercial aircraft, private planes (i live right next to the local airport), and having observed low earth-orbit satellites, i have a good understanding of what the typical aerial phenomenon are, their typical light configurations, and their 'classical' behavior.

i was looking for satellite activity, and spotted one moving north to south, as a number of these do on a regular basis.  all of a sudden, the satellite glowed, and seemed to increase in size, although at that altitude, it's the change between something star-like, and a large meteor/ shooting star, or something to that effect. then, the glow started to ebb, and the object veered slightly (3-to-5 degrees), and then, reversed direction!  so now i know i am seeing something other than a satellite (or aircraft). as it travelled back, it made several minor course alterations, again of perhaps 3-5 degrees. after another 45 seconds or so, the object disappeared.  since the night sky was cloudless, i was pretty sure this was either the craft cloaking itself, or moving away at high speed, but it could have simply been due to the distance and particulate in the air.  i have seen satellite 'disappear' in that fashion, and this object did not quite disappear in that way.

i had my 4 year-old son sitting in my lap with me, and he saw it, too. now since my first orb sighting 4 months ago, which occurred after a year of trying ce5 'summoning', i now know that et's are real, these vehicles are real, and are not us military drones.  and during these past months, i have tried several times a week to summon, to no avail.  tonight, i asked my son to 'meditate' with me, but i really didn't expect anything.  when i saw the object at first, thinking it was a satellite - business as usual - but when it glowed, i thought "wow! what?" could a satellite catch a sun ray at 10 pm from a setting (set) sun, and reflect back so brightly, making the object look twice its size? my heart started to beat a little faster. but when the object veered, and then changed directions by 180 degrees, i yelled out to my son, pointing. i then followed the object with my binoculars, until it disappeared a minute later.  i was very excited, and wished i had had a night vision video recorder with zoom lens.  i'll have to explore crowd-sourcing that...
content.summary: Satellite-like object observed, brightened suddenly, then changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
After a day of fishing we went to dock in a bay for the night we went to sleep at around 10:30 pm there were about 5 boats on the dock, this area is around 70 km from the nearest town there is no power or houses in this area. we have a 21 ft boat with a cuddy when you lay down you looking true a escape window a foot above you at around 3 am sound was waking me up (i'm a very light sleeper) when i turned myself over i was looking up and saw an object above us that made a strange beeping sound in different tones and in the middle of this object it look lick glass tubes with differed colored lights if they were scanning the area. 
for a long time i didn't want to know about this and sad nothing to my wife and kids but i keep seeing this image and hear this sound in my head. when i told them they were saying that i was koekoek and i know for sure what i saw because i'm not a dreamer.
content.summary: Hovering,strange beeping sound and blinking lights , like scanning

content.detailedDescription:
I'm standing at my front door that faces east at 10pm on 8/7/2014, i was just standing there enjoying the night then i seen a bright gold/white light come across the sky and stop abruptly.

i cant even tell you what i think it was, nothing i know of can move that fast and just stop like it did and just hover and make no sound at all!

after it stopped and was hovering i noticed it flash sequentially from gold/white to a red

pattern : 
white - white- red - white - white - red

the gold/white had a green aura type thing around it, im not the only one who seen it!

well i felt amazed that i was seeing something like that to start with but i did get a headache after and feel kinda sick

it went over the trees and building to the east then i lost sight but it moved at a lot slower speed like it was observing something!

i did get a video but im not sure how to upload it to here and it only a cheap smartphone that took it, not great video!
content.summary: The light was flying at a intense speed then stopped then hovered and flashed sequentially

content.detailedDescription: I was recording the clouds from inside,using a sony hd camera,i was watchinng the cloud changes,and only after playing the video back at a slower speed did i see the object,the object appeared round it was playing in the clouds,diving in and out,then shot out of the clouds and disappeared.Even now i am not sure what i saw because i never saw anything like this,i was so suprised tofind this in my video.
content.summary: Appeared from dark clouds,went down trail could be seen,came out of clouds went right to edge of clouds leaving trail,have video

content.detailedDescription: While watching for meteor,s in my backyard saw dull tiny .Like faint far away star moveing from north n.East at about 65 degres down to about 40 stop or turn at such a shape angle seemed almost like it made a u turn, and it was back up to about to 45,47 degres and off to my right or to the south of where it stop or turned. thiswas like all in one motion at this point i could see 3 dots of light triangle shape. im describeing it as lights but im sure it or theywere reflective light from sun or starlight.It was moveing slower than when it was comeing down  for just about second or two.Then it just took of to the south ,s,east at a upward angle at an incredable speed. this all took  about 6 or 8 sec. im sure object or objects were way way out in space,what ever it was moved many thousands of miles in these few seconds.I lost sight of object or objects as it sped off out of my sight.My reaction was that i knew i had seen something that was not a meteor,satalite space station air plane or anything else that i have ever seen.I also had a weird feeling about the whole thing but still told most everybody i came in contact with today.Thank you for letting me share this experiance.I am hoping to hear from  mufon.               thanks [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Outside watching for meteor,s looking e.N. eastfrom listed adress saw tiny dim ,dull  ,spec  of light moveing very very fast
